A film about Austerlitz

This is interesting. There’s a French film adaptation of (or rather, a French film about) Sebald’s masterpiece Austerlitz, something I was completely unaware of. Here’s a trailer from the Foundation pour la Mémoire de la Shoah website. Your French is better than mine:

All these films about Sebald’s books.
